topic.title: Advance Directives Section Entries Optional - conformance rules

section.p: Known Subclasses: Advance Directives Section, Advance Directives Section (entries optional) (V3)

This section contains data defining the patient's advance directives and any reference to supporting documentation. The most recent and up-to-date directives are required, if known, and should be listed in as much detail as possible. This section contains data such as the existence of living wills, healthcare proxies, and CPR and resuscitation status. If referenced documents are available, they can be included in the CCD exchange package.
NOTE: The descriptions in this section differentiate between "advance directives" and "advance directive documents". The former are the directions whereas the latter are legal documents containing those directions. Thus, an advance directive might be "no cardiopulmonary resuscitation", and this directive might be stated in a legal advance directive document.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7928, CONF:10376 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15340)/@code="42348-3" Advance Directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15342)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7930, R2.1=CONF:1198-7930)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7931, R2.1=CONF:1198-7931)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7957, CONF:8800)
Conforms to Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15340)/@code="42348-3" Advance Directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15342)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7930, R2.1=CONF:1198-7930)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7931, R2.1=CONF:1198-7931)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7957, CONF:8800)
Conforms to Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21"/> <code code="42348-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Advance Directives"/> <title>Advance Directives</title> <text>LbYOZeWs OAmVsL BYAEMlCPC CriXnxl SbLjHzgg WXcKq bWyCOoU DfOFgnQX LyBfYjW PVcMmR KUKszJDm JQjIMbGa XbrRfkr WdHDk wQmiJKr FRXhEwYe wbqmqbp XhElUElJ BHLVg RoqvGl nuBIC iroTxKJbH TWnpBTkw BJqfDupS mqHLOcp RbLTK DdBJB SHxoy UtZda dCRndrRt RkaFFd DNZuK dPPKiNTc rZRPy QZwtN AXIEmhtqY qBwuWE kIOkk qpvGfGAW yYdCST NPTUmUsy qgdWkqKVi ygorZNiN ZLqcOzKd ZIvXA Heviv KuVEJ mgyZt LtPvEKBc ksPULHj wtGVgGt JgbpNMJDd zQZAtRF zskcqjb MgJTMHwA AbWxhArYb iKzrITeA BPQkRk qSQJlQ vQuWgIerl umNEe oEfvR xTAiwrnm WNXoyDI GXzPe cnSMesQpm eHgBtLiW FQoVhKZm JXbUoERZb tkyLNYc zghbtO RNcLwBla Rhuxq TjcFYeOh wngdSN gzEGqeEKa </text> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <participant typeCode="VRF"> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <participantRole/> </participant> <participant typeCode="CST"> <participantRole classCode="AGNT"/> </participant> <reference typeCode="REFR"> <externalDocument/> </reference> </observation> </entry> </section>
